forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Southeast wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely between 3am and 5am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southeast wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 5pm, then a chance of thunderstorms and a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 71. South wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 44 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of thunderstorms and a chance of rain before 8pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run ski trail was groomed today, March 9, 2025. Grass has started to show and the north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Bucks today 10:30 AM - 1:45 PM. Lots of fun. Fast and controllable. The connector was groomed but hard and icy under the groom.  Still very usable. Very little forest debris.  Much less than up north last weekend. No dirt spots even when a few turns started to soften in the sun around 12:30.  Soft turns later in the morning were not that slow. Watch out for some small ice balls that sometimes end up in the skate lanes.  Very avoidable. The hills and turn through the pines in the back is still part of the trail.  Very nice!  Used A skis. Should be great tomorrow morning after the groom.  Thank you Huron Meadows crew. Great job!  Came over from Lansing today thanks to your efforts.Check out XC Ski Headquarters up north at Higgins Lake tomorrow.  You don’t have to be on the official team to participate in the Michigan cup relays. And the trails up there have been very good the last couple mornings. Thanks for 50 years of family service and winter fun XC HQ team!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has plenty of coverage , depth , and groom on the upper loops. The sweet spot between hard and soft was 10:30 to 1:00. A little bit of wind debris , but not an issue . LF 8 rilled

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 Lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Wednesday. Conditions will be very good this morning and too soft in the afternoon.
nubsNob.comments: A spring warm up is forecast today. The snow is machine groomed this morning and will quickly transition to wet spring snow by the late morning. The temperature is forecast to hit 60 degrees today. If you have ever had a goal to ski in the morning and bike in the afternoon, today is your day. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
